bibl.title: Ἐπὶ τὰ ξένια in Ptolemaic Egypt (iii/BC).
bibl.note: Meaning and institutional context of the term ἐπὶ τὰ ξένια, especially in Zenon's archive. - P. 253 : provisional reading of an unpublished text, dealing with the supply of a quota of pigs destined to be sent to the king.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II

bibl.seg: ALY Zaki, Ἐπὶ τὰ ξένια in Ptolemaic Egypt (iii/BC).
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II (Cairo, 1992) pp. 245-255.

Meaning and institutional context of the term ἐπὶ τὰ ξένια, especially in Zenon's archive. - P. 253 : provisional reading of an unpublished text, dealing with the supply of a quota of pigs destined to be sent to the king.
